review.title: “Boss is great leader”
review.pros: Pros – Great understanding of mkt issuesMg Dir is superb leader and can do deals very wellVery good bonus and reward for deals completedwork hard play hard get paid excellent - motto of company
review.cons: Cons – Difficult to balance work and home life as it is expected that people will work overtime whenever neededNeed a larger team - seem like each person doing work of 3 people sometimes but holidays are given later
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Very good boss but some people below him are not as good as they show himSome people need to be kicked out!
